Your satisfaction is important to us. If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please do not hesitate to contact us. Our team is here to assist you and ensure you have a great experience with Foxi.

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new terms on our website. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically. Continued use of the service after any changes means you accept the new terms.

We value your feedback and suggestions. Please feel free to reach out to us with any comments or ideas on how we can serve you better. Your input helps us enhance Foxi and meet your needs better.

sidebar.title: User Accounts
sidebar.text: This section explains the requirements and responsibilities associated with creating and maintaining a user account on Foxi. Please ensure you understand and comply with these guidelines to use our services effectively.

content.title: Registration
text: To access certain features of Foxi, you must create a user account. During registration, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. This information helps us serve you better and ensures the security and functionality of your account.

By registering, you also agree to keep your information up-to-date. Inaccurate or outdated information can lead to issues with your account and may affect your ability to use certain features of Foxi.

content.title: Account Security
text: Maintaining the security of your account is your responsibility. You agree to keep your password confidential and not share it with anyone. If you suspect any unauthorized use of your account, you must notify us immediately.

We recommend using a strong and unique password for your Foxi account. Regularly updating your password and using two-factor authentication, if available, can further enhance the security of your account.

content.title: Account Usage
text: As the account holder, you are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. This includes any actions taken by others who may have access to your account. Ensure that you monitor and manage your account usage appropriately.

If we detect any suspicious or unauthorized activities, we may take actions to protect your account, including temporarily suspending access or requiring additional verification steps. Our goal is to safeguard your account and personal information.
